channel.title: Helppp please short question <-------
channel.description:
hello people i have a simple question about the moparscape game i never played it before but i want to try it but the problem is i cant load it every thing fine till i have to enter my user and pass but when i try to log it says
error connection to server. must be down click cancel then start server to make your own
but i started a server i dont know how? i need a help to play it please help

it should then log you in but u will be only person on it until u portforward
